beforeMeeting.speaker: president
beforeMeeting.text: I have to do this right. If I say something wrong, they will find everything out. If a word appears in red, I need to type that on the keyboard... On we go. Bonjour

afterGoodQTE.text: I hear your demand! You all know I went to Area 51, and you asked if I met another form of life there.

afterBadQTE.text: I meant... Erm... I hear your demand! You all know I went to Area 51, and you asked if I met another form of life there.

beforeQTE.speaker: president
beforeQTE.text: I will tell you, once and for all...

afterGoodQTE.text: it just slipped out of my mind...
...but I do know that it was a very pleasant walk! Walking is very good for your health. Erm... Isn't it lunch time?

afterBadQTE.text: I meant... Erm... It just slipped out of my mind....
...but I do know that it was a very pleasant walk! Walking is very good for your health. Erm... Isn't it lunch time?

afterMeeting.text: Phew... Let's be careful. Tonight I am being interviewed. They are going to ask questions. Better be prepared.
